- Location/assembly: Ceiling-mounted exhaust vent; metal louvered cover in drywall ceiling (likely bathroom).
- Materials: Metal vent grille; painted white; framing screws visible.
- Condition: Dust/dirt buildup on slats; slight edge grime around frame; no visible rust or water stains.
- Recommendations: Clean grille to improve airflow; inspect duct for obstructions and confirm vent exits outdoors.
- Notable surroundings: Adjacent surface appears to be a white wavy panel or wall finish (no identified issue).
